text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Apex Legends. The build quality of the Alienware AW15R4-7712SLV-PUS 15.6" FHD GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is solid, and the speakers is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the Alienware AW15R4-7712SLV-PUS 15.6" FHD GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Apex Legends. The build quality of the Alienware AW15R4-7712SLV-PUS 15.6" FHD GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Alienware AW15R4-7712SLV-PUS 15.6" FHD GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop!

A definite 5 stars!
